name: rent_nft
attributes: # [doc = " NFTを一定期間レンタルするが、所有者照合チェックがない"]
body: let rent_acc = & mut ctx . accounts . rental_account ;
let fee = ctx . accounts . config . fee ;
* * ctx . accounts . user . to_account_info () . lamports . borrow_mut () -= fee ;
* * ctx . accounts . treasury . to_account_info () . lamports . borrow_mut () += fee ;

let cpi_accounts = Transfer { from : ctx . accounts . owner_nft_account . to_account_info () , to : ctx . accounts . user_nft_account . to_account_info () , authority : ctx . accounts . service_authority . to_account_info () , } ;
token :: transfer (CpiContext :: new (ctx . accounts . token_program . to_account_info () , cpi_accounts) , 1 ,) ? ;
rent_acc . renter = ctx . accounts . user . key () ;
rent_acc . rental_count = rent_acc . rental_count . checked_add (1) . unwrap () ;

fields.name: rental_account
fields.attribute: # [account (mut)] # [doc = " 本来は #[account(has_one = owner)] を指定して所有者照合を行うべき"]

fields.name: user
fields.attribute: # [doc = " レンタル実行者（署名者）"]

fields.name: owner_nft_account
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 所有者のNFT保管アカウント"] # [account (mut)]

fields.name: user_nft_account
fields.attribute: # [doc = " レンタルユーザーのNFT受取アカウント"] # [account (mut)]

fields.name: service_authority
fields.attribute: # [doc = " CPI実行権限を持つサービス権限アカウント"]

fields.name: config
fields.attribute: # [doc = " レンタル料設定アカウント"]

fields.name: owner
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 本来このレンタルを所有するユーザーのPubkey"]

fields.name: renter
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 現在レンタル中のユーザーPubkey"]

fields.name: active
fields.attribute: # [doc = " レンタル状態（true=レンタル中）"]

fields.name: rental_count
fields.attribute: # [doc = " これまでのレンタル回数"]
